CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT($CustomMetadata.Custom_Feature_Enablement__mdt.Automated_Collections_Letters.Feature_is_Enabled__c), "&solmgr=1" + "&id=" + Id + "&templateid=a2F5b000001WQuBEAW"+ "&ofn=" + TEXT(TODAY()) + TEXT(Days_Past_Due__c) + " Days CS Delinquency Letters" + "&APDF=1" + /*Specifies whether merged PDF documents will be saved as individual PDF documents or consolidated into one document. */ "&QMode=Download" + /* Downloads files to content workspace */ "&ContentWorkspaceId=0580a0000001Ji4" + "&queryid=[Account]a275b000002bSl3AAE?pv0=" + Id + "&DefaultPDF=1" + /* DefaultPDF sets the default output type to Adobe Acrobat. */ "&ZipPDFs=0" + /* Assembles PDFs into one large file */ "&ac0=1" + /*Automatic Activity Logging 1=True */ "&ac2=1" + /* AC2 saves the text of a merged Word document to the body of an Activity (Task)*/ "&ac1=Past Due Delinquency Letter Generated" + /*AC1 provides an Activity Subject.*/ "&LG0=0" + /*(Save Text) determines whether to store the text of the document (post-merge) to the body of the Task.*/ "&LG1=Past Due Delinquency Letter Generated" + /*Activity subject*/ "&LG4=1" + /*Specifies whether to automatically log an activity after merging. 1=Enabled */ "&lgwhoid=" + Send_Bills_Contact__c,
"&solmgr=1" + "&id=" + Id + "&templateid=a2F5b000001WQuBEAW"+ "&ofn=" + TEXT(TODAY()) + " " + Account_Number__c + " " +TEXT(Days_Past_Due__c) + " Days CS Delinquency Letter" + "&APDF=0" + /*Specifies whether merged PDF documents will be saved as individual PDF documents or consolidated into one document. */ "&QMode=SalesforceFile" + /* Downloads files to Master Object (Account) */ "&ContentWorkspaceId=0580a0000001Ji4" + /* unused, but required for ContentCustomFieldName */ "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=SalesforceFile" + "&queryid=[Account]a275b000002bSl3AAE?pv0=" + Id + "&DefaultPDF=1" + /* DefaultPDF sets the default output type to Adobe Acrobat. */ "&ZipPDFs=0" + /* Assembles PDFs into one large file */ "&ac0=1" + /*Automatic Activity Logging 1=True */ "&ac2=1" + /* AC2 saves the text of a merged Word document to the body of an Activity (Task)*/ "&ac1=Past Due Delinquency Letter Generated" + /*AC1 provides an Activity Subject.*/ "&LG0=0" + /*(Save Text) determines whether to store the text of the document (post-merge) to the body of the Task.*/ "&LG1=Past Due Delinquency Letter Generated" + /*Activity subject*/ "&LG4=1" + /*Specifies whether to automatically log an activity after merging. 1=Enabled */ "&lgwhoid=" + Send_Bills_Contact__c + "&ContentCustomFieldName=Mail_Type__c" + IF(Days_Past_Due__c = 67, "&ContentCustomFieldValue=certified", "&ContentCustomFieldValue=firstclass")) /* can set only one custom field so ContentVersionTrigger sets Ready_for_Paper_Bill_Queue__c if Mail_Type__c is set */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field leveraged by Conga batch to generate delinquency letters
CustomField.label: Conga Lettersteam Delinquency
